answers.answer: They will keep a eye on u..and that does cause u to have big baby's. .its commen to get this kind of diabetes in pregnancy and can dissappear too...but best of luck with the rest of ur pregnancy and birth. .

My mom had gestational diabetes with me. They don't take the baby out early or anything if you stay healthy. The baby will be a big baby but that's just an indication that the baby will develop diabetes some time during their life. I'm 23 and still haven't developed diabetes, but I know I will. I just eat healthy and try my hardest to exercise whenever I can. But don't worry, your baby will be absolutely fine! :)
And by the way, I was consequently a big baby. 9 pounds 10 ounces.
I had gd. I had my bby yesterday at 40 weeks 1 day and he weighted 9 pounds 13 oz

question: Anyone have gestational diabetes? Just found out I do & I'm wondering if they take baby early cause of it? They said he is gonna be a big baby.
title: wondering
